obr
Class DTGParser

java.lang.Object
  obr.DTGParser

public class DTGParser
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides static functions to parse a single rule from its string representation, or a full set of rules from a file.

Method Detail

parseRule

public static AtomicRule parseRule(java.lang.String str)
                            throws UnrecognizedStringFormatException
Parses a rule under a DTG format.

Parameters:
str - The rule string representation.
Throws:
UnrecognizedStringFormatException - If the string format is not ok.

parseRules

public static GraphRuleDependencies parseRules(java.lang.String filePath)
Parses a file and returns the graphe of rule dependencies generated from the rule set.

Parameters:
filePath - The path to the file to read.
Returns:
The graph of rule dependencies corresponding, or null if an error occured.
